me.utk.networking

Interface ServerSideClient


  • public interface ServerSideClient
    A client for a server-side application.

    This class provides utility methods for sending messages to the client and receiving messages from the client (via a MessageBuilder).

    Version:
    December 8, 2020
    Author:
    Utkarsh Priyam
    See Also:
    MessageBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageBuilder getMessageBuilder()
      Returns the MessageBuilder associated with this client.
      void sendMessages(String... messages)
      Sends the given messages to the specified client, using implementation-specific messaging protocols.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessages

        void sendMessages(String... messages)
        Sends the given messages to the specified client, using implementation-specific messaging protocols.

        The sent messages are guaranteed to be received in exactly the same order as they were sent, unless specified otherwise in documentation.

        Parameters:
        messages - String messages to send to client
        See Also:
        MessageBuilder.nextMessage()

      • getMessageBuilder

        MessageBuilder getMessageBuilder()
        Returns the MessageBuilder associated with this client.

        This MessageBuilder is responsible for collecting and coalescing received message fragments sent by that client into a complete message that can then be used by server.

        Returns:
        The MessageBuilder associated with this client
        See Also:
        MessageBuilder
